value:
If I had my way, this absurd festival
would not exist...since there would
be nothing but ruin in my wake.

"Trick or treat?" Pah. Try "the utter
destruction of the world, or treat."
And I do not have a sweet tooth.

Giving thanks for the harvest? Hmph.
Of course you worms would waste
time on something so meaningless.$k$pResources exist to be consumed.
It's as simple as that.

Before you play a trick on me, think
hard of the consequences. Surely
even a worm like you can imagine it.

You think I'm enjoying all this?
Perhaps in your complacency you've
forgotten the danger you're in.

So you're $Nf's
friend, hm?$k$pOnce I'm done with that worm, I'll
continue the harvest here.

The harvest is upon us. Now that
I am here, nothing shall be spared
from the reaper's scythe.

The only things you will reap
are ruin and despair.
You call THIS a bounty?! Pathetic.

What I want, I take. Pray this meager
offering is enough.

You have some nerve to summon
Grima to this harvest festival. Now
prepare to learn what true trickery is.

It seems you possess a grave
misunderstanding of the harvest
festival, $Nu.$k$pYou may celebrate nature's bounty,
but remember that there are winners
and losers in every exchange.$k$pFor you to gain something, someone
else must lose it. What brings joy to
you casts bitter sorrow upon another.$k$pThose without the will or power to
resist can only be crushed underfoot.
Such is the nature of the harvest.$k$pNow you see the world through the
Fell Dragon's eyes. Thus, I ask you:
Are you the hunter or the hunted?$k$pConsider well your path. For my part,
I will continue to reap the harvest's
bounty through ruin and despair!
たあっ
消すよ
ぐあっ
生意気だね…
Your candy. Now.
Struggle if you must.
Surprise! You're dinner.
I will rend you asunder!
This cannot be.
ふふっ…
This outrageous costume was not my idea. Do not ask me about it again.
Listen well, worm... This may be a festival, but do not use it as occasion to wriggle your way closer to me.
The propensity of humans to while away their days in pointless frivolity is a deficiency I will never comprehend.
I find it ironic that a "harvest" festival should be celebrated not by the predator, but by the prey.
Help me recover the rest of my memories...and I'll consider tossing a few pieces of candy your way.
I am Grima... I am despair... And I...am not enjoying this festival...
You may enjoy the festival as much as you wish... So long as you remember there is a price for wasting my precious time.
Could be worse.
Present my prey.
Sweet release.
